rows.label: qst101413_msg001
rows.name:
グーラにあるブノの果実を使えば
楽に倒せるよ(仮)

rows.label: qst101413_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, hello.
Are you biology enthusiasts?

rows.label: qst101413_msg0002
rows.name:
Crops have been failing recently...
That's why I'm researching how to
increase agricultural...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh. He's...
Oh my...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0004
rows.name:
When we were both young, we'd
often team up to work in the field...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0005
rows.name: A Rampaging Sauros, huh...?

rows.label: qst101413_msg0006
rows.name: I'm just a humble biologist, but...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0007
rows.name:
Hold on. There's one plant with
properties that may be of use here.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0008
rows.name:
You see, a few years back I published
a research paper on Benoît Nuts and
the Rampaging Sauros.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0009
rows.name:
You see, when a Rampaging Sauros
ingests Benoît Nuts...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0010
rows.name:
it becomes greatly intoxicated,
which impairs its motor skills.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0011
rows.name:
In other words...
It's as if it's drunk.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0012
rows.name:
You may be able to use this fact
to more easily deal with even the most
ferocious of specimens.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0013
rows.name:
Rampaging Sauros normally like to
hide in their roosts, making them
hard to track down.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0014
rows.name:
But they do mark their territory
by leaving claw marks around the area.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0015
rows.name:
Place a Benoît Nut inside the marked
territory to lure the beast out. If it
takes the bait, it'll be all yours.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0016
rows.name:
Benoît Nuts come from a rare plant
which grows in Superbia.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0017
rows.name:
I remember hearing you can gather
them near Turbine Tower.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0018
rows.name: Best of luck on your search.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0019
rows.name:
I wish I'd gone with them...
I might have noticed the danger
and warned them...

rows.label: qst101413_msg0020
rows.name:
At least by advising you, I can put my
mind at ease a little. Best of luck.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0101
rows.name:
Benoît Nuts should be growing
near Turbine Tower.

rows.label: qst101413_msg0102
rows.name:
Place one inside the beast's territory
and wait for a good chance to strike.
Got it?
